name: 15" Spare Tire Covers for Tire,USA Flag Trailer Spare Tire Cover for All-Around Protection,Universal Spare Tire Covers for Trailers Fits Cars SUVs Trucks Diameter 27.55"-29.52" (15 inch)
short_description: 🚘 USA Flag - This spare tire cover 15 inch wheel features a black and white American flag, which is bold, innovative and creative, and can convey your strong patriotic feelings to others when you put it on your car. Fun and fashionable, not only a fashionable item for car decoration, but also show your personality and charm.

🚘All-Around Protection - Our large RV spare tire cover focuses on all-around care, with a thickened surface for protection, thicker elastic cords, and a large-capacity full-wrap design that can firmly cover your car. Tight alignment and exquisite craftsmanship make it a faithful companion on your journey, greatly enhancing your traveling experience.

🚘Product Specification - The spare tire covers for trailers measure 29.92*29.92*0.27 inches and fits tires with a diameter of 27.55"-29.52", this product fits most wheel models of cars, SUVs, and trucks on the market today. However, you still need to compare the size of your tire size before purchasing in case of mismatch.

🚘Premium PVC - In making this breathable sunscreen spare tire cover, we used a tightly woven, soft and breathable PVC material with excellent heat resistance. When parked outdoors, it not only greatly reduces the heat generated by strong direct sunlight on the tires and slows down the aging of the rubber body on the outside of the tires, but also prevents damage to the tires from other harsh rain and snow conditions.

🚘Size Calculation - Please take care to calculate the size size of your car tires before purchasing. First find the tire parameters on your tire. Then calculate according to the formula A*B/100*2+C*2.54. For example, the tire specification is 255/45R20, A=255, B=45, C=20, then the diameter=A*B/100*2+C*2.54=25.5cm*45/100x2+20inch*2.54=73.75cm, the tire diameter of 73.75cm belongs to 15inch range, so please choose 15inch.

name: Tire Cover Diameter 33"x47"H, Heavy Duty Waterproof 600D Outdoor Tire Storage | Spare Tire Wheel Cover,Universal Truck Camper Tough Spare Tire Bag with Waterproof Zipper, Reflective Handles
short_description: Universal Tire Cover Size: Universally compatible size, designed for tires with a diameter of 84cm (33 inches) and a height of 120cm (47 inches). Seasonal Spare Tire Cover - Spare tire bag with handle, heavy-duty outdoor winter tire storage bag, dustproof and scratch-resistant, suitable for trucks, SUVs, trailers, campervans, and RV travel.

600D Waterproof Oxford Cloth: Made with high-density 600D Oxford cloth and an ultra-high water-pressure resistant PU coating, combined with fully sealed waterproof strip edging and double reinforced stitching, enhancing the waterproof and scratch-resistant performance of the new seasonal tire bag. Heavy rain, snowmelt, and acid rain cannot penetrate, providing multi-season protection for your tires.

Sturdy Windproof Design: Exclusive design with double drawstrings at the bottom and a special triangular fabric loop buckle for double securing from top and bottom. In strong winds, the cover stays firmly attached to the tire without shifting or falling off, eliminating the hassle of repeatedly picking up and removing the cover.

Nighttime Safety Design:Features a bright orange reflective handle on top, providing a highly visible safety warning at night. It easily slips onto the tire without needing to lift it, ensuring a perfect fit. The reinforced handle ensures optimal protection and a secure grip, making it even more convenient to carry.

Durable and Effective Protection:Made of 600D Oxford cloth, offering excellent waterproof and tear-resistant properties. It comes standard with a fully waterproof zipper, and the bottom of the zipper features a Velcro closure to prevent rainwater from seeping in. From the fabric and stitching to every accessory, durability is the guiding principle, ensuring long-term performance without degradation.

name: Spare Tire Cover Fit for Your SUV, Jeep, RV, Trailer, Truck, Waterproof Dust-Proof PVC Leather Tire Covers (14 inch for Diameter 23.62” - 27.16”)
short_description: 【Fits Wheel Diameter】Fits 23.62” - 27.16” Tire Diameter. There is a drawstring at the stitching opening of the spare tire cover, you can tighten the elastic belt to make it fit more closely with the tire and to prevent wind damage.

【Humanized Design】 Elastic band design is more humanized, for a fast and adjustable fit. Sewing fine, waterproof performance better. The drawstring at the stitching opening of the spare tire cover can be adjusted to make it fit your spare tire more closely.
【Waterproof AND Washable Material】Soft and scratch-free PVC leather material, Waterproof, anti-corrosion, strong wear-resistant, wipe-clean vinyl with non-scratch backing.
【EASY INSTALLATION】 Our Spare Tire Cover are easy to install and remove and no tools required. Elasticized back hem for a fast and adjustable fit.

【Wide Application】 Fits for tire diameter 23.62"~32.68" (Not the rim size). Please select the appropriate tire cover size according to your tire diameter or by calculating the parameters above the tire. Universal for most car tires. Fit for many car models, especially fit for Honda CR-V, Jeep Wrangler, Campers, Toyota CRV RAV4, Suzuki, Ford and Trucks.
product_description: Product description: Why choose us? 1. Classic Fabric Rugged, wipe-clean material with a soft non-scratch backing protects your tires. 2. Clean Look Covers keep the back of your vehicle looking pristine, even when your spare isn't brand new. 3. Secure Fit Elasticized back hem provides for a secure fit. Cover Size Guide: Cover Size 14" inch fits for tire diameter 23.62" ~ 27.16" (60~69cm) Spare Tire Cover Diameter Calculation Guide Step 1: Find Your Tire Parameter. It’s written on your tire side Step 2: Calculate Your Tire Diameter If your tire is written with P225/65R17, A=225 B=65 C=17. Tire diameter=A*B/500+C*2.54 =225*65/500+17*2.54 =72.43cm According To the Sizing Guide, 15" Spare Tire Cover is the size that fits your spare tire. Item Description: Package: 1Pcs Spare Tire Cover Material: PVC Leather (Waterproof & Dustproof) Warm tip: Please place it in ventilated place for two days to remove odor once receive it.
